0.text: Sorry - just a little bit longer! Sorry! Please come back again!

1.speaker: Alembrosius
1.text: Oh... do you actually want one? Sorry... erm... can't sell you any right now, but you can look! Mum'll be back soon. I mean - *ahem* - shopkeeper'll be back soon.
